Classes

Master github-pages for teaching

View the Project on GitHub sarahcnyt/classes

  • Donald Trump survey on Muslims http://ichef-1.bbci.co.uk/news/624/cpsprodpb/E11D/production/_87092675_000001atrump.jpg from the Center for Security Policy. Go through how Politifact reviewed the survey – it’s a useful way to go about how to look into the quality of research and data. Take a look at The Polling Company, and its clients. (Koch-related campaigns and non-profits). Also look at Philip Bump in The Fix

  • Top search terms: Google. http://www.nytimes.com/2015/12/17/technology/google-top-search-terms-2015.html

  • Chipotle dinners on The Upshot Also on the Upshot: “Which team do you cheer for?”, from Facebook data provided to the Times. Both examples of companies with a stake in the publicity giving data to a news organization.

Discussion of the use of social media in “studies”. What could the problem be? Green Revolution from the Atlantic and http://www.wired.com/2009/06/iran-before-you-have-that-twitter-gasm/ from Wired. CNN and sentiment analysis live from Twitter.

An easy source, but who does it represent?

  • Company-sponsored surveys or reports. Manpower employment
  • Government data: How should you evaluate it?
